member.name: CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB
member.summary: The CryptoAPI CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure is used for an arbitrary array of bytes. It is declared in Wincrypt.h and provides flexibility for objects that can contain various data types.

member.name: CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB.cbData
member.summary: The count of bytes in the buffer pointed to by pbData.

member.name: CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB.pbData
member.summary: A pointer to a block of data bytes.
